title: Expansion of a Taylor Series about x = 2

content.prompt: Let f be the function given by f(x)=ln(3-x) . The third-degree Taylor polynomial for f about x=2 is

choices.label: − ( x − 2 ) + ( x − 2 ) 2 2 − ( x − 2 ) 3 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4907@

− ( x − 2 ) − ( x − 2 ) 2 2 − ( x − 2 ) 3 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4912@

( x − 2 ) + ( x − 2 ) 2 + ( x − 2 ) 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46DD@

( x − 2 ) + ( x − 2 ) 2 2 + ( x − 2 ) 3 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@480F@

( x − 2 ) − ( x − 2 ) 2 2 + ( x − 2 ) 3 3 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4907@

topic.text: 10.11: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor Polynomial Approximations of Functions

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
